David Joseph , the chief executive of Universal Music, told The Guardian newspaper: Wait is not a word in the vocabulary of the current generation. It's out of date to think that you can build up demand for a song by playing it for several weeks on radio in advance. Matt Cardle , the latest X Factor winner who signed to Sony through an agreement with Simon Cowell , sold 439,000 copies of his song When We Collide after it went on sale immediately after the final.

Andy Coulson , who has denied wrongdoing, also resigned as Prime Minister David Cameron 's communications chief last week after numerous questions about practices at the newspaper. "Our Silver Perspectives enrichment program offers travellers interesting journeys hosted by noted historians, political analysts, bestselling authors and other esteemed experts," said Steve Odell , Silversea's senior vice president Asia Pacific. And many of these voyages will feature several guest lecturers teaming up to host a broad range of entertaining and enlightening presentations on a single itinerary. One such sailing with multiple guest speakers is Silver Spirit's 15-day, Dubai-to-Athens World Cruise Segment 5109, departing April 18.
